name: Salty Trawler
description:
In this chill fishing sim, you get to enjoy a calming trip on the small fishing vessel, the "Salty Trawler". Stationed in a small fishing town in the Pacific North-West, you take to the seas to catch small fry and big game alike to bring in some cash, which you can use to upgrade your fishing rod and more!

This pet project of mine took me about 2 months on and off to complete. I plan to iron out some bugs and add a few more features in the future, but right now, I have other projects I am moving on to. Enjoy!
